items.title: Solano County moves into the less restrictive Orange Tier of the State’s Blueprint for a Safer Economy, effective June 2
items.summary: The State of California announced today that Solano County will move from the Red Tier into the less restrictive Orange Tier of the Blueprint for a Safer Economy effective Wednesday, June 2, 2021. The California tier-based metrics have helped provide a framework for reopening businesses, schools and other community venues.

items.title: Solano County Emergency Rental Assistance Program provides cash-assistance to qualifying low-income households impacted by COVID-19; applications available through Catholic Charities of Yolo-Solano
items.summary: Renters in Solano County who have lost income or experienced other financial hardship due to COVID-19 and need rental or utility assistance are urged to apply to the federally funded Emergency Rental Assistance Program (ERAP), designed to support low income households impacted by the pandemic health emergency.>> Click HERE to download the program flyer
